name: Into the Nickyverse
description:
This is a game made for the Nickyboi art contest. The game was supposed to be longer and have more characters, but I had to work on finishing finals for school.

Your friend has asked you to come over and watch their place for a while. Though there is a strange noise coming from their room. Will you investigate.

Controls -

Use W, A, S, D to move

Press E to interact with objects

Press Esc to open the menu

The game looks best in full screen due to some UI issues.

There are some issues at the beginning of the game looking at the 3D objects, but once they are loaded in there should not be any issues.

CAUTION: There are some loud noises in some parts.
